mods.abstract: Arrangement of three copies of a single composition. Main image is divided into four areas along a horizontal line. Abstract semi heart shaped forms are placed on a mottled black textured background. The centers of the forms are colored dull yellow and orange-yellow. The strips are duplicated and attached to a black background in the three stripes. The set enclosed in a white chalk line border. Edges of attached strips are peeling up.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
